column4: so anyone know why my xserver is busted based on what i said earlyer?

what's the problem?
and they did something to it
so when i rebooted it did somehing to xserver
are you running breezy?
and it screwd it up so i have text only and that is it
yes
udev was broken, but is now fixed.
ok how do i get that so every thing works again
just upgrade
how
perhaps you should not be running breezy if you don't know how.

okay, sudo aptitude update, followed by sudo aptitude upgrade
ok sorry just trying here
lui: please make sure you have the latest udev package installed
